description:
Saizo heads for the theatre town, still possessed by the mask Youi. Yukiatsu tries to draw out Ayagami from Saizo but she refuses, fearful of having the meaning of her name revealed. Saizo claims she is a wrongdoer, and her hidden past comes to light.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A tavaszi virágok illata, a szűz tánca
Holy Music of Girl Smelling March Flowers
Yayoi Hana Nioi Musume no Kagura
